name: Loony Run
description:
Crazy races against your friends or random people around the world in real-time!

Loony Run is similar to Mario Kart but on a 2D platformer for up to 4 players, with plenty of obstacles to beat and an arsenal of powerups and weapons to use against your opponents to emerge victorious.

Will you be able to get to the Masters' League?

- Real-time Multiplayer

Play against your friends or random players around the world in real time.

- Ranking System

Prove you're a real pro and climb up the ranking system.

- Arsenal of weapons and powerups

Rockets, swords, bombs, turbos and many more items to make your opponents' life harder.

- Customize your look

Dress up to look unique.
